dcterms:description: A dataset containing over 200 million labeled question-answering pairs collected from two major community question-answering websites in China, Baidu Zhidao and Sogou Wenwen. The dataset is organized into specific categories, with a focus on QA pairs that have at least one best answer.
dcterms:title: Community Question-Answering (cQA) Dataset

dcterms:description: A conversational dataset acquired from two popular forum websites, Baidu Tieba and Douban, containing approximately 100 million open-domain posts with comments. The data is organized into sets of independent dialogues, where each dialogue consists of multiple turns of chats between two people.
dcterms:title: Conversational Dataset
